title: SatsLife
author: SatsLife
content: AUCTION - AlpenCoin 2020 Advent Calendar. More info here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5293028.0Description: These are the first 24 coins in the Vreneli 2.0 series. Brilliant finish. A001-A024. The calendar has never been opened. It's still in the original packaging and I have never actually seen the coins inside. All 24 coins are therefore unredeemed.   AUCTION TERMSItem for Sale:  1 OF 1 ALPENCOIN ADVENT CALENDAR 2020Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.4 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.01 BTCAuction End Time: Monday, December 26th @1800 EST  countdown clock...  https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20221226T18&p0=156&font=cursiveSniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule. All lots extended with any bid to any lot...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from USA. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Address: bc1qcrj67q5lywxyn587mrhx488avzvz2awhlacn7m Payment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer

comments.body: bump. fwiw the last stacks and bowers Vreneli 2.0 MS69 went for $690... The last Vreneli 2.0 on forum went for 0.0147 ($286 at the time)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5413544.0
